website_summaries.verdict: Displaying an old-school skate shoe style, the DC Stag features a bulky silhouette that most 90s skateboarders love. The shoe's beefy profile is brought about by a well-padded interior that shoe users find very comfortable and supportive. Moreover, its neutral colorways that are crafted from a combination of different materials provide a versatile and stylish aesthetic that appeals to both new and OG skaters alike.
pros: Majority of the reviewers found the DC Stag to be very comfortable
The shoe seems to be well-built, according to a handful of purchasers
Several consumers liked the sneaker so much that they had to buy it in multiple quantities
Most skaters who loved the bulky skate shoe design adored the fact that this pair is exactly what they were looking for
It is available in a variety of color schemes and upper material
This kick fits true to size
Some shoe users commended its excellent grip
A couple of wearers were delightedly surprised that it is breathable and light
The sneaker offers excellent arch support, based on some reviewers
Most consumers believe that this pair is a great product with good value for money
cons: One reviewer griped about how it doesn't have a lace loop on the tongue, as the tongue tends to slip on one side
Some shoe users claim that the shoe doesn't last long, mainly when used for skateboarding

customer_reviews.title: Great mountain bike shoe
customer_reviews.text: I bought these DCs for mountain biking. I tried them on and found the tongue was too fat for my liking these days. I slit the side open on the tongue and removed the huge piece of foam. I cut the foam in half to be thinner and trimmed the sides to help fit back in the tongue and had my mom sew them back together (shes a black belt with the sewing machine lol). Added insoles and these shoes look, feel, and perform great. Nice firm platform on pedals and very grippy . I will update if mtb pedals chew up the soles.
customer_reviews.author: JMall

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: I have only worn them 3 times for a short period of time and I just noticed that both shoes have already begun to fray in the same area on both shoes which leads me to believe the product was produced by a sub standard manufacturer I'm highly dissapointed I wont be buying or recommending DC brand shoes again
customer_reviews.author: John H

customer_reviews.title: Runs a size small
customer_reviews.text: The build quality looks great and the shoes look great, but they definitely run small compared to other DC shoes. My husband has had DC shoes in size 10 before and wore them for years. This pair of size 10, are labeled size 10 but fit like a size 9. He could barely get his foot into the shoes and his toes crammed all the way to the very end, so much so that he considered them painful. I will be returning them as they are incorrectly sized.
customer_reviews.author: Anita Hilton

customer_reviews.title: Good looks and fitment but falling apart already
customer_reviews.text: Love the look and comfort of these shoes but after 1 and a half months of occasional wear (4 times a week maybe no skating, no biking, no running no active wear at all besides walking) they are already falling apart. Seriously, wth is happening to DC shoes? DC's used to last me 6 months or so of skating every day and now I can't even walk in them for less than 2 months before they fall apart. ** Update ** I contacted DC and they took care of the issue by sending me a $50 gift card which is just about what I paid for these. Great communication and execution by DC.
customer_reviews.author: D Larson

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoes - need inserts
customer_reviews.text: I put arch supports in because they are so flat. Now they are super comfy. For price, it's a good shoe. Big thick tongue to protect foot from skateboard. Toe area is not padded for best feel when doing tricks. Kick flips, double king spins, half out pull fulls, dooby flip trips and wheel pops are all better with these! 🤣👏
customer_reviews.author: 🇺🇸Hardly Drivenson motor troubles🇺🇸

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality, check size chart
customer_reviews.text: I have ordered DC shoes for a long time and have always had to size up 1 full size. Check the size chart when ordering and compare with a shoe you already have. These hold up quite well.
customer_reviews.author: Miles to Go Adventures

customer_reviews.title: He likes to skateboard and these are a great shoe for it
customer_reviews.text: We bought these for our 11 year old son. He likes to skateboard and these are a great shoe for it. Durable and "Cool" to the kids, these make a decent every day shoe for that little skater in your life. However, don't expect them to have great traction on slippery surfaces or have good arch support. Skate shoes are made to feel the board under your feet, but you lose out on traction and arch support in the process. Great shoe for what it is and our son? He couldn't be happier with them.
customer_reviews.author: Sidewok

customer_reviews.title: This is my second pair of DC shoes for MTB platform pedals. Great decision
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for mountain biking. DC shoes have previously fared well against aggressively spiked pedals, so I wanted to stick with the brand. Not sure which model shoe I had before, but these have a slightly stiffer sole, which is good. They still comply enough for my feet to sink into the concave pedal. At first it felt like my toes were getting jammed, but all I had to do was tighten the laces more, as my foot was sliding forward while pedaling hard.
customer_reviews.author: Thunder Buddy

customer_reviews.title: Look and fit great.
customer_reviews.text: I had the white and carbon Stag shoes, so I couldn't pass these up to replace them. They fit and look great, but they have a soft spot at the heel on only the right shoe that makes a fart sound every time I step. It's only on the right, and it's so soft it feels like I could push my finger through it. DC quality as usual. Hit or miss.
customer_reviews.author: EVOlve

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes but can’t remove the insoles.
customer_reviews.text: Well padded and better constructed than the court graphic model. Nice looking shoes that are holding up well to near everyday wear. Leather feels like it’s decent quality and is not too stiff. Broke in quickly and are pretty comfortable. It would be nice to remove the insoles and replace them With something better but they seem to be glued in which is why I knocked a star off the review. Haven’t skated them yet...going to let them wear out a bit first.
customer_reviews.author: I'd Prime that.

customer_reviews.title: Another awesome pair of DC shoes.
customer_reviews.text: I've been buying DC shoes for the past 10+ years and they never disappoint. I love the contrast and red soles on this pair and they consistently fit great.
customer_reviews.author: Mike C.

customer_reviews.title: Cheap garbage
customer_reviews.text: Shoes looked nice online but after paying $74 I got a shoe I wouldn’t have spent $35 on if I had seen it first. Pretty sure these shoes didn’t last more than a couple months and I don’t have them anymore so..., pretty much cheap garbage.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: DC makes a lot of nice shoes
customer_reviews.text: Nice shoes a lot of people have complimented them. Comfortable right out the box. Really sticky shoes. Going to be awesome skate shoes once they are broken in.
customer_reviews.author: TX master plumber

customer_reviews.title: Great for MTB riding~!!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for MTB riding purpose...Love the color and style... Flat bottom surface really great for MTB flat pedal~!!! Only took 5 days shipping to Korea~!!!
customer_reviews.author: freekt

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as they used to be
customer_reviews.text: I've been wearing DC shoes since 1996. They are no where near as comfortable as they used to be. These shoes have a flat shoe insert. I am going to have to buy a better insert. Shoes look good but I can't wear them all day. I wish DC stuck to quality and not make the shoes cheaper. But its getting harder and harder to find a pair of all black shoes that look good so I bought a couple of pairs and I'll deal with them not being as comfortable as I like.
customer_reviews.author: Jorge

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe, not wide
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe. Feels very durable. Sides are a little tight at the ball of the foot. Hopefully once they are broken in it will be better. I have a wide foot so folks with standard width shouldn't have any issues.
customer_reviews.author: Rich

customer_reviews.title: So far the shoes are great.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these shoes as a gift for a friend and so far he loves them. He works on a production line in a factory and is on his feet twelve to fourteen hours a day, so he needed good shoes. So far all he's said about them is that he loves them, and that they are comfortable. He goes through a lot of shoes so I am curious as to how long they will last. I will try to update my review once he has had them for a while to report on how they are holding up.
customer_reviews.author: Atheos

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: I like the look of them, but that's about the only think. Probably the worst DC shoe I've ever purchased, and I've purchased quite a few. Looks like they're wide, but hurts the bunions on both feet, rubs really bad and not comfortable. Disappointed in these shoes DC, I KNOW you're better than this!
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Robotnik

customer_reviews.title: Classic DC fit and style
customer_reviews.text: Hard to find classic style skate shoes any more so glad to find these on Amazon. Durable and comfy for wide feet.
customer_reviews.author: Jonah Salerno

customer_reviews.title: Affordable, true to DC style
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect little running around shoes! Put some memory foam insoles in and you’re good to go. Super affordable. I now have 2 pairs and won’t hesitate to buy more.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easily best shoe for the price
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been wearing DC and DC shoes only for over a decade. I’m a bigger guy, size 13 shoe and they always fit so comfortable and to me personally they always look stylish, especially the stag shoe. Easy to clean and very durable shoes, I’ve ran pairs into the ground and they’ve endured major abuse far longer than expected. I’m not one for flamboyant colors so I always get black/white/gray pairs and I’ve always been happy with em.
customer_reviews.author: Ghostwithin

customer_reviews.title: Price Increase for B Stock, Fits Well
customer_reviews.text: Not bad. I think I got a return since the box was scuffed and the shoe treads had a little rock stuck in them already while unboxing (probably from someone walking in them). They were $60 USD when I added to cart, then the website froze and the price went up to $75 USD after I refreshed. Besides those things, the shoes definitely look better in person, and fit as expected. Hopefully you folks will get a new pair when you order!
customer_reviews.author: Nightmare

customer_reviews.title: Fit as expected
customer_reviews.text: Tried these shoes on at a store before bying off amazon and the product fit as expected, only gripe is the stitched on plastic side eyelets were a little tough to get the lace though, this product arrived fast. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: William F.

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and breathable
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes, used to buy them as a kid for skating now I buy them as regular shoes. They last forever , comfortable, and breathe nicely
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoe
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these for my son. the quality was good, he liked the style and fit. He is a skateboarder and used these for that purpose. I am only giving 4 stars because they only lasted through 3 months of skateboarding.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie

customer_reviews.title: Love DC Board Shoes. Comfort, Light weight & fit as expected
customer_reviews.text: At least my 4th or 5th pair of DC's. I keep coming back because the are comfortable and always wear well over time. Good fit and made to last
customer_reviews.author: Bill H

customer_reviews.title: Good price point,
customer_reviews.text: Not bad for the price. Under 30 bucks The fit was a little large but still wear them and like them.
customer_reviews.author: biggy

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice, but not for us!
customer_reviews.text: I really liked the look of this shoe but it didn't fit. It also seems like this shoe doesn't "breathes" very much (just a some vent holes on the toe). We ended up getting the "DC Men's Kalis Lite M Skate Shoe", it's more breathable and lower profile... just what we were looking for!
customer_reviews.author: outdoorsmom

customer_reviews.title: You can't go wrong with DC!
customer_reviews.text: My son is a walking DC advertisement! He loves the products. I always bought Nike shoes because of the quality, but DC holds up just as well. My son is 15 and is HARD on shoes! These last! I used to buy 2 pairs of Nike's for school, and be out almost 200.00. I now buy 3 pairs of DC shoes (and another pair for Christmas), for so much cheaper! These shoes are stylish and boys love them. I highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Sarah&Austin Adams

customer_reviews.title: Favorite pair of shoes ever
customer_reviews.text: Favorite pair of shoes ever. HAnds down. comfortable, clean. cant beat it. wish you could still get.
customer_reviews.author: sam w.

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe for MTB Boys.
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my son specifically for Mountainbiking using flats. HE says the are super comfy but also plenty of stiffness so there is no arch cupping on the pedals. the design provides extra protection from branches and cactus thorns.
customer_reviews.author: Bill K.

customer_reviews.title: Comfy sneakers
customer_reviews.text: DC sneakers have been a goto for several years, they look exactly as described and the fit is spot on. As a side note these sneakers do not provide arch support and have a very different feel if you are accustomed to other sneakers i.e. nike, sketchers etc. Would recommend to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Worth 50$
customer_reviews.text: Horrible traction in wet conditions comfortable shoe though worth the 50ish dollars
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Poor Chinese version of a great company
customer_reviews.text: Fits great and feels iv'en better Update: there's definitely a down grade when made in China don't hold up to the smallest amount of skating
customer_reviews.author: Lochlan

customer_reviews.title: Does not follow the same sizing standards as Court Graffik's
customer_reviews.text: Having worn DC Skate shoes Court Graffik line for years, I was a bit disappointed that these to do not follow the same sizing standards. They are narrower, not alot but not an easy fit like my old Court Graffik's. A bit disappointing, but I'll know better next time. Will update on "wear n tear" in a few months.
customer_reviews.author: jim

customer_reviews.title: Looks good but ripped after a month of regular wear
customer_reviews.text: Shoe was great.... while it lasted. Show ripped after a month of daily wear. Regular wear no skating & ripped near the toe. If I was still within my return period I would have returned them. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Becca Magaro

customer_reviews.title: Good price
customer_reviews.text: One of the shoes looks slightly deformed when looking at it straight from far back but doesn't really bother me it could be why it was on sale lol
customer_reviews.author: Everardo

customer_reviews.title: Awesome buy
customer_reviews.text: Been looking for some new kicks and found a perfect match
customer_reviews.author: The Champ

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes. Gonna order different colors. This may be a permanent perchase i. My wardrobe.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoes
customer_reviews.text: Nice shoes, comfy and fit well. Hopefully they hold up since DC quality is hit or miss these days. So far so good
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Lebowski

customer_reviews.title: They looks good but feels very cheap
customer_reviews.text: They looks good but feels very cheap. inside shoe it's hard and doesn't feel comfortable, feels like $20 Chinese shoe. Rather add couple extra bucks and go for a higher class.
customer_reviews.author: Peter

customer_reviews.title: They are just ok.
customer_reviews.text: I got the green and grey pair back in August. Overall the shoes are very comfortable and fit perfectly. They get 3 stars because they squeak with every step I take and the bottom has already lost piece of rubber on the heel because where the black on the bottom meets the white on the back they made the black rubber too thin.
customer_reviews.author: Isaiah Rockefeller

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes great quality
customer_reviews.text: DC shoes have always been the go to shoe for my son. They are wide enough for his feet and always look great. The only thing he didn't like with these is they made his feet look really small.
customer_reviews.author: Carie E. Forbes

customer_reviews.title: Arrived within two days happy about that but I ware a size 12 and ...
customer_reviews.text: Arrived within two days happy about that but I ware a size 12 and these are a little snug don't get me wrong my toes aren't curled up or anything but there is no extra room at all I'm hoping they will break in and loosen up but if your a 12 you might consider 13 cause I don't think they come in 121/2
customer_reviews.author: Link BC

customer_reviews.title: These look great and match all most everything in my man's wardrobe
customer_reviews.text: These look great and match all most everything in my man's wardrobe. They are comfortable and the material is good and without defect. Were a bit spendy for my taste, especially since my BF is hard on his clothes and shoes. Other than the price we really like them.
customer_reviews.author: Angie Genn

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the price
customer_reviews.text: I am really happy with the quality of the shoes. They fit as expected and were received quickly ! Very happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: Comfy lasts a year with everyday wear for 11 hours plus
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my hubby cause there the only kind he will wear and they don't sell them at the stores any more so was so happy to find him a all black pair of his previous versions in black for work can't wait to buy more when he wears this pair out
customer_reviews.author: Brittany josephine

customer_reviews.title: These were my favorite shoes over the last year
customer_reviews.text: These were my favorite shoes over the last year. on top of that they lasted well over 8 months(i typically only get 4 months out of a pair of shoes). and they were insanely comfortable!
customer_reviews.author: Craig

customer_reviews.title: Great Looking and Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: This is one good looking shoe and it is also so comfortable. So far, it has worn well--still looks almost like new!
customer_reviews.author: Larry

customer_reviews.title: Right size
customer_reviews.text: Too small even though if it was the right size!
customer_reviews.author: Anastasia Nagasiak

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I work for a green house so I'm always moving and still wearing these to tbis day and still are good-
customer_reviews.author: Jimmehundead

customer_reviews.title: Three weeks and already coming apart
customer_reviews.text: Normally I would give these five stars review, but there is one big issue. While they look awesome, they are already coming apart. Front of the shoe is separating from the sole just after three weeks of daily wearing. IN my opinion that is unacceptable for such a known shoe company
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: NOt your 90's shoe
customer_reviews.text: This is not your 90's shoe, the toe is not open like it use to be, not the slipper shoe I remember.
customer_reviews.author: smokiediebear

customer_reviews.title: Too pretty for the park
customer_reviews.text: Ambivalent about these shoes... They look great, made of leather, grippy soles, relatively comfortable, big fat tongue The upside is that they were as cheap as chips
customer_reviews.author: Zippydidooda

customer_reviews.title: probably should get some nice insoles for them
customer_reviews.text: Typical DC's. They hurt my feet if I wear them too long, probably should get some nice insoles for them. But, when I wear them I usually only wear them for a couple of hours anyway. They fit as expected and look nice.
customer_reviews.author: CJTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as described
customer_reviews.text: It’s just what I was expecting. I’m very happy with the product and the delivery was faster than expected
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Size runs small.
customer_reviews.text: Love the style and it's a more slender skate shoe which is what I was looking for. The reason this product didn't get a better rating was that it fit a little small. I am an 8.5 and my feet get a little cramped after wearing them all day.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Dc always quality
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe fits perfect. Update with how long they last
customer_reviews.author: Manny

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Great quality and affordable. Im familiar with dc sizes and the quality and fit are both better than i expected
customer_reviews.author: james mohney

customer_reviews.title: Terrible Quality
customer_reviews.text: Recieved and started wearing these shoes on August 28th. By October 1st, they started falling apart.
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: Fit great
customer_reviews.text: My boyfriend loved his shoes they fit great! The only thing that you can't really tell from the pictures is that there is a velvety material in several places on the shoe that he doesn't like because it wears down very fast.
customer_reviews.author: borttaylo

customer_reviews.title: Excellent grip great looks!
customer_reviews.text: They look damn good plus these are the longest lasting DC's I've ever owned great for moving truck ramps, super grip plus the grip lasts a long time
customer_reviews.author: Mark Moore-Janis

customer_reviews.title: Description needs to match
customer_reviews.text: Item not as described or pictured to late to do anything about it
customer_reviews.author: S

customer_reviews.title: Legit Kicks!
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes, awesome style. Loved the color and instantly had to buy them (impulse buyers beware). Chick at work totally digs them so that's a plus I suppose. Quick shipping, awesome packaging, would buy from this seller again!
customer_reviews.author: Caleb Fultz

customer_reviews.title: wear quicker than DVS but still better any NIKE today
customer_reviews.text: my first pair of DC, they wear quicker on the toes than DVS,,, if you are getting them for durability get DVS, not bad though! Better than any NIKE nowdays
customer_reviews.author: Tim Harper

customer_reviews.title: Really Nice Shoes
customer_reviews.text: Just takes a while to break them in. I use them all day for work and am constantly on my feet so it hurt a bit for the first day. I work outside on RV's and when i got them in the mail, i almost didn't even wanna use them as work shoes because they really do look nice. Plus green and black is my favorite color. Good shoe by DC.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Great for bmx
customer_reviews.text: I do bmx and all ways like DC shoes so far their holding up good on the bike pedal
customer_reviews.author: Torry

customer_reviews.title: Dent in shoe
customer_reviews.text: The only real complaint my husband had was that the shoe was bent at the toes. He said it took a bit of time for it to straighten out.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor Helton

customer_reviews.title: Fits ok at first
customer_reviews.text: But this specific model of dc's will kill your feet after you wear them a while. After I'd had them for work for a few months, the shoe bent in such a way that the toe on the outside part of the shoe was bending in and crushing my toes. Not cool. I think that's why this particular model of DC is so cheap. Spend the money for the better models, or throw them away and get new ones after a couple of months.
customer_reviews.author: Mark S.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love them! They sure dont make DC's like they used to ... but still comfy
customer_reviews.author: Kurt

customer_reviews.title: Comfy but runs a little small.
customer_reviews.text: Im a size 12 shoe, but on these a size 13 fit perfectly. Their very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Diablo

customer_reviews.title: I love them
customer_reviews.text: DC you did it again!!!! I am happy customer, people listen I purchase this on special price at $29.94dlls including taxes and this Tennis are amazing looking and they feel great while walking on them, this item/purchase made my month honestly, I plan on buying them on full black now since they are still on special :)
customer_reviews.author: Rubén

customer_reviews.title: I was looking for tennis globe but DC, surprised me this time,I don't buy DC a long time ago
customer_reviews.text: They are perfect, I was looking for tennis globe but DC, surprised me this time,I don't buy DC a long time ago, good quality
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love my new DC's
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these when I saw they were on sale. They fit just like they should. I continue to purchase DC's because the shoes last and are always very comfortable. I bought these for a stupid crazy low price and after I tried them on, put them in the closet to save for later.
customer_reviews.author: K.H.G.

customer_reviews.title: Great looking and comfy.
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are sick and comfortable as hell. They fit great and the tongue is extra cushy. They look great with pants or shorts, just keep the socks hidden :).
customer_reviews.author: Seth

customer_reviews.title: pretty comfortable and well made
customer_reviews.text: Overall, pretty comfortable and well made. Similar to previous DCs I've owned.
customer_reviews.author: kristina

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoe for the price.
customer_reviews.text: I have a relatively flat arch and I find these shoes very comfortable. The shoes have thick padding. Some buyers may find the thick tongue hard to get use to but it helps hold the foot firmly without binding. Only time will tell if the comfort level will be maintained throughout the life of the shoe.
customer_reviews.author: M.W. Thinker

customer_reviews.title: I usually love dc shoes but I got these and the right ...
customer_reviews.text: I usually love dc shoes but I got these and the right shoe was to tight around the toe areas.
customer_reviews.author: Michael W. Whatley

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my grandson's birthday. He loves DC shoes. They fit perfectly and arrived the day before his birthday. The service was prompt and exactly as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Carol A Dahlin

customer_reviews.title: Nice Shoes
customer_reviews.text: DC never lets me down. I bought this for my husband and these shoes always last him a few years. The quality on this shoe is excellent, very well made. It fits like previous DCs I've bought.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfy
customer_reviews.text: Just what I wanted. I took this shoes on vacation I walked over 10 miles a day in Disneyland & my feet were comfortable all day
customer_reviews.author: steve wallace

customer_reviews.title: Red/Black/White
customer_reviews.text: Fit's better than expected! DC Shoes are absolutely the BEST shoes for my feet. I have never had any issues out of them as far as fitting and durability. Would buy every pair they have if I could.
customer_reviews.author: Caleb Fultz

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes. Wore them today and they fit perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Josh Veach

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fit a little tighter then expected but other then that they are fine
customer_reviews.author: David franklin

customer_reviews.title: I do alot of of walking up and down stairs, 2 jobs, these shoes make it easier.
customer_reviews.text: Shoes are perfect!!! Fit like a dream. I have wider feet usually fit size 9. 5 or 10. These are perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua B.

customer_reviews.title: Not quite the right size.
customer_reviews.text: I always wear a 10.5 but needed an 11 for this type of shoe apparently. Cost me money to ship it back and get a replacement. Other than that the shoes are good quality and I still wear them many months after the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Kinney

customer_reviews.title: They are very nice and perfect sizing
customer_reviews.text: great purchase and perfect size !!! I love them .
customer_reviews.author: Jackie Linville-Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Go up a size
customer_reviews.text: Do not go off measurements go up a full size but overall my husband loves them
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Hubbard

customer_reviews.title: Shoe-tacular!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered these for my husband. They look great and he said they are very comfortable. He wears a steel toe boot for work daily, so these are a nice change during his leisure time. :)
customer_reviews.author: #mommingainteasy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The perfect in-between skate shoe. Not too bulky, not to slim.
customer_reviews.author: Josh Y.

customer_reviews.title: Super cool and comfy
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes! They are perfect for me and they look super cool. I worried at first but the grey/black looks just like the photo. True to size
customer_reviews.author: Amethyst

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value!
customer_reviews.text: Great sneakers! Excellent value for durable, leather shoes. This is the second pair of DC's I've ordered from Amazon for my now 9 1/2 year old son (he is already 4'8" & wears a size 8 shoe!), that I'm sure will be 6feet tall by the time he's in 6th grade! He loves these shoes, they are "in" & most important, I can afford them! Thanks Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: Cupcake chick

customer_reviews.title: I would buy again.
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes. Perfect fit I wear size 14 so hard to find shoes in stores. Buying again but all black.
customer_reviews.author: shelby settle

customer_reviews.title: Save your money
customer_reviews.text: Shoes lasted all of a month and a half of casual usage before the sole unstitched itself from the shoe. Junk shoes. Switching back to etnies
customer_reviews.author: Chase

customer_reviews.title: The length is fine but the width is tight
customer_reviews.text: The length is fine but the width is tight, I’ve been trying to break them in but they still hurt my feet I’m thinking I may need to swap them out, other than that they’re fine I would buy again just maybe get a different brand
customer_reviews.author: Joe Mccarthy

customer_reviews.title: Solid shoes at an amazing price!!
customer_reviews.text: Just what I expected at an amazing price... Great shoes, I might get another pair soon. I use them for work and they're comfortable and seem very durable
customer_reviews.author: Eric Jimenez

customer_reviews.title: I felt super tight when I first put them on but after ...
customer_reviews.text: I felt super tight when I first put them on but after wearing them for about a half a day they stretched out and are comfortable and good shoe
customer_reviews.author: Nicole A.

customer_reviews.title: They fit perfect, and are really comfortable he says
customer_reviews.text: I bought these shoes as a Christmas present for my boyfriend. They fit perfect, and are really comfortable he says. He wears a 10 1/2 and the size fits as expected. I'm completely satisfied with these shoes! They were a great purchase I think.
customer_reviews.author: Marrissa Stanick

customer_reviews.title: Super light, strong and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Super light, strong and comfortable. Very good purchase. Fit perfectly. No complaints. I had stopped buying skate shoes but I glad I got these. Better than I expected them to be. 100% recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: Justin B.

customer_reviews.title: Fit like a set of
customer_reviews.text: DC usually fit my wide feet. Not this time. Fit like a set of nikes
customer_reviews.author: tony borges

product_meta.title: DC Men's STAG Skate Shoe, Dark Grey, 9 UK
product_meta.description: DC recognizes the fusion between art and skateboarding, taking footwear to the next level. Delivering uncompromising comfort, durability, and eye-catching fashion, DC is the source for everyday and technical skateboarding footwear.
